ConnectionStrings.AppDb: <put your connection string here, in appsettings.Development.json, in .net user-secrets or as a proper env variable in .env file in project root>

ClientAppPorts: <put your client app ports here, in appsettings.Development.json, in .net user-secrets or as a proper env variable in .env file in project root>
ShowSwaggerInProduction: <put your swagger visibility in production here, in appsettings.Development.json, in .net user-secrets or as a proper env variable in .env file in project root>
DeleteDbIfExistsOnStartup: <put your delete db on start here, in appsettings.Development.json, in .net user-secrets or as a proper env variable in .env file in project root>
